articles.title: Annual Meeting of Organizations for Study of Juche Idea in Nepal Held
Chinese Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Annual Meeting of Organizations for Study of Juche Idea in Nepal Held 
    Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- An annual general meeting of organizations for the study of the Juche idea in Nepal took place in Katmandu on Dec. 9.
 On display in the venue of the general meeting were photos of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il giving field guidance to the work in various sectors of the national economy.    
 Present there were leading figures and members of the Nepal Institute for the Juche Studies, the Nepalese Institute for Self-Reliance Studies, the Youth Institute for Self-Reliance Studies of Nepal and the Nepalese National Joint Study Centre. The meeting reviewed the work done by the organizations this year and discussed the orientation of their activities for the next year.

Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory letter from the economic and commercial councilors corps here on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of his assumption of office as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
 The letter was handed to an official concerned by Evelio Duenas Ponce, commercial councilor of the Cuban embassy here, who is doyen of the corps, on Wednesday.

Basis to Identify Bird Flu Viruses Established in DPRK
    Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the Branch Academy of Cell and Gene Engineering under the State Academy of Sciences of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have found out the basis to rapidly and correctly identify any types of bird flu viruses.
 When bird influenza broke out in some chicken farms in the spring this year, they confirmed in a matter of ten days that the type of the virus was A (H7N7).
 They, basing themselves on this research success, have deepened the research work to put the nation-wide bird flu prevention campaign on a scientific basis.    
 Ho Kwang Chun, director of the branch academy, told KCNA that scientists designed primer for analyzing genes of M, HA and NA and solved scientific and technical problems arising in correctly identifying types of sub-species from H1 to H15 and from N1 to N9 in reliance upon the biology engineering technology (RT-PCR).

Yang Hyong Sop Meets Palestinian Ambassador
    Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and conversed with Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Shaher Mohammed Abdlah, who paid a farewell call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.
